CmdLine: apt-get update -q   && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive     apt-get install -qy     cm-super     fontconfig     ghostscript     latex-beamer     latex-xcolor     latexmk     texlive-bibtex-extra     texlive-fonts-extra     texlive-fonts-recommended     texlive-font-utils     texlive-generic-extra     texlive-generic-recommended     texlive-latex-base     texlive-latex-extra     texlive-latex-recommended     texlive-math-extra     texlive-science     --no-install-recommends   && apt-get clean   && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*   && mkdir /root/work   && chmod 755 /root
Commands.Name: run
